Summary: My dad saw a white puff thing, then saw a darkish gray ufo like thing. He got a video.
divs: sighting detailsmy dad saw a white puff thing, then saw a darkish gray ufo like thing. he got a video. he was out looking at what he thought was a star in broad daylight flashing orange and other colors, he was hoping to get it on video with his camera so he proceeded to record, he didn't get the orange light on video. what he did get after later review was a white puffy structure which is not a cloud, and then a grey classic ufo looking thing. later in the video there is a bird flying through the frame. (you tube link moved to investigators report field) cms flg 08\23\11 09:57cst i edited this video for this report.
